name: CokeHouse
description:
CokeHouse is a indie horror game where a man who loves coke the most in the world, chases you.

Story

You sneaked into the CokeHouse. There's a man who loves coke in the house, and he'll do anything to protect his cokes. You have to steal 18 of cokes and run away!...

Be careful.. There's a lot of victims already slain in CokeHouse....

Controls

• WASD : Move

• Mouse : Look around

• E : Interact

• Hold Shift to sprint.

• Hold Lctrl to Crouch.

• Space bar : Jump

• F : Flashlight

Tips?

- Turn off flashlight while the man is around.

- There are some objects that don't seem to interact, But they could be interacted sometimes.

- He gets faster and faster every coke you get.

Please let me know if there is a bug or something strange.

Feel free to give me feedback!
